title: GSATechDose #3
author: Web Development Team
content:
In this article, we'll cover essential web development best practices that every developer should follow to create high-quality, maintainable websites.

## 1. Write Semantic HTML
Using semantic HTML elements like <header>, <nav>, <section>, and <footer> makes your code more readable and improves accessibility.

## 2. Follow CSS Naming Conventions
Adopt a consistent naming convention like BEM (Block, Element, Modifier) to create more maintainable CSS code.

## 3. Optimize Performance
Minimize HTTP requests, compress images, and use lazy loading to improve page load times.

## 4. Ensure Accessibility
Make your website accessible to all users, including those with disabilities, by following WCAG guidelines.
